mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INDVDL_CLNT(CLNT_NUM, CLNT_NAME, CLNT_GRADE, PHONE_NUM_1, PHONE_NUM_2, ADRS, DTL_ADRS) VALUES (INDVDL_CLNT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{clnt_name}, #{clnt_grade}, #{phon_num_1}, #{phon_num_2}, #{adrs}, #{dtl_adrs})
mapper.select: SELECT I.CLNT_NAME, I.CLNT_GRADE, I.PHONE_NUM_1, N.WRITE_DATE FROM(SELECT CLNT_NUM, CLNT_NAME, CLNT_GRADE, PHONE_NUM_1 FROM INDVDL_CLNT WHERE 1=1)I INNER JOIN CNSL_NOTE N ON I.CLNT_NUM = N.CLNT_NUM ORDER BY I.CLNT_NUM DESC
